BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: Oversight - Evaluating Diversity and Inclusion in the FDNY.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Evaluating Diversity and Inclusion in the FDNY.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a recruitment and retention plan for firefighters
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a recruitment and retention plan for firefighters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a survey of permanent firehouse upgrades to establish a working environment that facilitates use by a mixed gender workforce
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a survey of permanent firehouse upgrades to establish a working environment that facilitates use by a mixed gender workforce.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting demographic information of members of the fire department at fire companies and special operations units
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reporting demographic information of members of the fire department at fire companies and special operations units.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to plan and implement training on diversity, inclusion, anti-discrimination and anti-harassment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the fire department to plan and implement training on diversity, inclusion, anti-discrimination and anti-harassment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to annually report on equal employment opportunity complaints
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the fire department to annually report on equal employment opportunity complaints.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Speaker Adams, Borelli, Williams, Mealy, Hudson and Powers
